text: Didier Bezace (10 February 1946 – 11 March 2020) was a French actor. He staged works by Georges Feydeau, Emmanuel Bove, and Molière whose (The School for Wives) opened the Festival d'Avignon in July 2001. In television, he can be seen in Les Thibault, Sissi and recently in Mon fils d'ailleurs. He was also in the movir Le Pressentiment, working with Jean-Pierre Darroussin based on the novel by Emmanuel Bove. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Paris Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors
title: Didier Bezace
